name: Banterbury 0.5
description:
Banterbury 0.5 is a prototype prequel for my VR Game, Banterbury.  You play as the titular Banterbury, on the run from the authorities and finding himself lost in a swamp with a mystical giant frog who sends you on a quest to find the holy lance.

Level Design / Modeling / Writing: Stephen Glatfelter

Level Design / Modeling / Writing / Audio: Corran Nolan

Lead Programmer / UI: Jamie Park

Animation / Modeling / Audio: Stefan Vo

CONTROLS:

KEYBOARD - WASD to move, Left Click to interact, Space to jump

XBOX 360 CONTROLLER - Left Joystick to move, Right Joystick to look around, A to interact, B to jump

PS4 CONTROLLER - Left Joystick to move, Right Joystick to look around, Cross to interact, Circle to jump
